title: Drawing, "Motorama/DragonOil", after 1980
medium: Red, black and blue marker, yellow, white and red colored pencil, green and aqua crayon, red ink, graphite on white tracing paper, pressure sensitive masking tape.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description:
Two rectangular layout designs for Motorama DragonOil, one at top right, another at center of sheet. At upper right corner, layout in horizontal orientation with gray, yellow and red with black ruled lines. White circle with black M at center. Red oval with MOTORAMA in black.
Central layout consists of red background with ruled black lines, white circle with Min black at center. Yellow oval above with MOTORAMA in black. Masking tape covers the word DragonOil at right of design.Random marks of green, black and red in lower portion of sheet.
Markers applied to verso of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Motorama/DragonOil", after 1980.
after 1980. Red, black and blue marker, yellow, white and red colored pencil, green and aqua crayon, red ink, graphite on white tracing paper, pressure sensitive masking tape.. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-387.
